Hey! I'll be heading to Paris soon. Can you suggest a hotel, a car rental company, and a restaurant with the best ratings? I'm looking for the best options that are also budget-friendly.

3. get_hotels_prices - to get the price range for the hotels
4. get_all_car_rental_companies_in_city - to get a list of car rental companies in Paris
5. get_rating_reviews_for_car_rental - to get the ratings and reviews for the car rental companies
6. get_car_price_per_day - to get the price per day for the car rentals
7. get_all_restaurants_in_city - to get a list of restaurants in Paris
8. get_rating_reviews_for_restaurants - to get the ratings and reviews for the restaurants
9. get_price_for_restaurants - to get the price per person at the restaurants
